name: Greater than
definition: The value is known to be greater than the recorded value.
provenance: Adapted from CUAHSI HIS CensorCodeCV.  See: http://his.cuahsi.org/mastercvreg/edit_cv11.aspx?tbl=Cen

name: Less than
definition: The value is known to be less than the recorded value.
provenance: Adapted from CUAHSI HIS CensorCodeCV.  See: http://his.cuahsi.org/mastercvreg/edit_cv11.aspx?tbl=Cen

name: Non-detect
definition: The value was reported as a non-detect. The recorded value represents the level at which the anlalyte can be detected.
provenance: Adapted from CUAHSI HIS CensorCodeCV.  See: http://his.cuahsi.org/mastercvreg/edit_cv11.aspx?tbl=Cen

name: Not censored
definition: The reported value is not censored.
provenance: Adapted from CUAHSI HIS CensorCodeCV.  See: http://his.cuahsi.org/mastercvreg/edit_cv11.aspx?tbl=Cen

name: Present but not quantified
definition: The anlayte is known to be present, but was not quantified. The recorded value represents the level below which the analyte can no longer be quantified.
provenance: Adapted from CUAHSI HIS CensorCodeCV.  See: http://his.cuahsi.org/mastercvreg/edit_cv11.aspx?tbl=Cen

name: Unknown
definition: It is unknown whether the data value as reported is censored.

name: Presumptive Evidence of Presence
definition: Presumptive evidence of presence of material.

name: Analyzed for but not detected
definition: Material specifically analyzed for but not detected.

name: Contamination
definition: Analyte was detected in both the environmental sample and the associated blanks. See Office of Water Quality Memorandum 97.8.
